value:
Everyone here has a fighting spirit.
In that respect, this place feels much
like the Officers Academy.

When I was a mercenary, I rarely got
too close to anyone. That all changed
when I became a professor.

I can patrol the area if need be. I have
experience from my mercenary days,
and from watching over my students.

As a professor, I spend most of my
time teaching others. But I believe
I could learn something from you.

I sometimes feel I am grasping for a
purpose in life. Perhaps someday
I will know what it is.

I'm here to say hello in
$Nf's stead.
Such power dwells within?
Together we can grow stronger.
I'm not setting a very good example.
A new path to tread.

I'm Byleth. I used to be a mercenary,
but now I'm a professor. I will help
your cause however I can.

How long has it been since I was
summoned to this world to fight
alongside you?$k$pThe flow of time brought us together,
and now we are bound inextricably.
I am your ally, and you are mine.$k$pI have not forgotten the needs of my
students. But I have no regrets about
my decision to join your cause.$k$pThe Sword of the Creator empowers
me to sever my doubts—to carve a
path through tangles of uncertainty.$k$pWith this sword in hand, I will defeat
our foes and lead us to victory.
せいやっ！
見えた！
くうっ
まずいっ！
Allow me to demonstrate.
Let the lesson begin.
No hesitation.
It's over.
I'm sorry... I can't go on.
Hmm
Combat, strategy... I learned it all from my father.
Whether I look it or not, I'm rather surprised.
A proper overcoat offers an extra layer of protection.
My heartbeat is...not what you would expect it to be.
My mother died shortly after I was born. I can't even recall her face...
The flow of time guided me here...
I will protect all that I hold dear.
Yes.
What now?
Let's move.
